value: This document defines the handling procedure for Credit Card Retained at ATM, which is handled by CCC - HK Teleservices Team.
This procedure applies to Credit Card Retained at ATM and applicable to all credit cards and R evolving C ash Card (RCC) clients .

CCE/SCCE : Client Care Executive / Senior Client Care Executive
Spec/SSpec : Specialist/Senior Specialist 
Service Operations

Voice recording Permanent
Related documents 7 years
The retained card will be returned to the bank within 7 to 14 days.
